game.name: Cloud Keeper: Shrine of Dal
game.genres: 액션, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Summon an army of clouds in this auto-battler survivors-like bullet heaven inspired by Korean folklore! Recruit cloud companions, collect relics, befriend shrine visitors, and survive against the monster hordes!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Summon an army of clouds in this auto-battler survivors-like bullet heaven inspired by Korean folklore! Recruit cloud companions, collect relics, befriend shrine visitors, and survive against the monster hordes!
